root.name: NHL 2K
root.description: OverviewNHL 2K was developed by Blackbox and release during the 1999-2000 NHL All-Star break. The game featured simplified controls, true to life puck physics and realistic graphics for it's time. NHL 2k's cover athlete was Detroit Red Wings froward Brendan Shanahan 1-4 playersVMU compatible: 190 blocks
